main event: A visual observation of a bright white object moving at high speed in Bradenton, Florida, on January 6, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 6 to 8 feet in diameter and disc-shaped., The witnesses observed the object for about one minute before it disappeared from view., The object appeared to be illuminated from within, with no exhaust or contrail visible., Two civilian witnesses included a housewife and a retiree., Initial observations noted intense flashes of light emitted from the object.
